web.login.secure_link_helper.en: A secure link will be sent to your email inbox.

web.auth.verify.success.en: Your account has been verified successfully

web.auth.verify.expired_key.en: This verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
web.auth.verify.expired_key.translation: 이 인증 링크가 만료되었습니다. 새로운 링크를 요청하세요.

web.auth.verify.already_verified.en: This account has already been verified. You can sign in now.
web.auth.verify.already_verified.translation: 이 계정은 이미 인증되었습니다. 지금 로그인할 수 있습니다.

web.auth.verify.unable_to_verify.en: Unable to verify account. Please try again or contact support.
web.auth.verify.unable_to_verify.translation: 계정을 인증할 수 없습니다. 다시 시도하거나 지원팀에 문의하세요.

web.auth.verify.check_email.en: Please check your email for a verification link

web.auth.verify.error.en: Account verification failed. Please check your verification link or request a new one.
web.auth.verify.error.translation: 계정 인증에 실패했습니다. 인증 링크를 확인하거나 새로운 링크를 요청하세요.

web.auth.verify.check_email_help.en: Check your email for the most recent verification link
web.auth.verify.check_email_help.translation: 가장 최근의 인증 링크를 확인하려면 이메일을 확인하세요

web.auth.verify.check_spam.en: Check your spam/junk folder if you can't find the email
web.auth.verify.check_spam.translation: 이메일을 찾을 수 없는 경우 스팸/정크 폴더를 확인하세요

web.auth.verify.contact_support.en: Contact support if you continue to have issues

web.auth.verify.missing_key_message.en: Please use the verification link sent to your email address to verify your account.
web.auth.verify.missing_key_message.translation: 계정을 인증하려면 이메일 주소로 전송된 인증 링크를 사용하세요.

web.auth.change_password.success.en: Your password has been changed successfully

web.auth.change_password.error.en: Password change failed. Please verify your current password and try again.
web.auth.change_password.error.translation: 비밀번호 변경에 실패했습니다. 현재 비밀번호를 확인하고 다시 시도하세요.

web.auth.close_account.warning.en: This action cannot be undone. All your secrets will be permanently deleted.
web.auth.close_account.warning.translation: 이 작업은 취소할 수 없습니다. 모든 비밀 메시지가 영구적으로 삭제됩니다.

web.auth.close_account.confirm.en: I understand this action is permanent

web.auth.password_reset_request.descript.en: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password
web.auth.password_reset_request.descript.translation: 아래에 이메일 주소를 입력하시면 비밀번호 재설정 링크를 보내드립니다

web.auth.password_reset.description.en: Please enter your new password below. Make sure it's strong and unique to protect your account.
web.auth.password_reset.description.translation: 아래에 새 비밀번호를 입력하세요. 계정 보호를 위해 강력하고 고유한 비밀번호를 사용하세요.

web.auth.passwordReset.emailSent.en: An email has been sent to you with a link to reset the password for your account
web.auth.passwordReset.emailSent.translation: 계정 비밀번호를 재설정할 수 있는 링크가 포함된 이메일이 전송되었습니다

web.help.check_spam_folder.en: Check your spam or junk folder

web.help.check_email_spelling.en: Verify you entered your email address correctly

web.help.wait_few_minutes.en: Wait a few minutes - emails can sometimes be delayed

web.help.try_again.en: Try requesting a new link if it's been more than 10 minutes

web.help.use_magic_link_instead.en: Use the Magic Link option to sign in without a password. Once signed in, you can change your password in Account Settings.

web.help.account_locked_explanation.en: After multiple failed sign-in attempts, accounts are temporarily locked for security. Wait 15 minutes and try again, or use Magic Link to sign in.

web.help.contact_us_description.en: If you're still having trouble, we're here to help. Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
